title: Central Bank of India deposits in Q4 grows 7%
description:
Central Bank of India reported a 10.75% year-on-year growth in total business, reaching ₹7.05 Lakh Crore as of March 31, 2025. In the previous corresponding period, the company reported total business of ₹6.37 Crore.

The company’s deposits logged a growth of 7.18% to ₹4.13 Lakh Crore as compared to...

title: Fiscal deficit higher, climbs to 29.9% of full-year target at July-end
description:
The Centre’s fiscal deficit has climbed to 29.9 per cent of the full-year target by the end of July, data released by the Controller General of Accounts (CGA) on Friday.

The deficit was significantly lower at 17.2 per cent of the Budget Estimates (BE) in the same period last year. In the first quar...

title: EDITORIAL: Liberal fiscal fantasies won’t fix economy
description:
The American humorist Mark Twain, attributing the original quotation to British prime minister Benjamin Disraeli, famously said, “there are three kinds of lies: lies, damned lies and statistics.”

To that, we should add a fourth — previous Liberal estimates of government spending compared to what wa...

title: Centre pegs FY25 GDP growth at 6.4% in 1st Advance Estimate
description: The central government on Tuesday released the first advance estimate for the current financial year, pegging real gross domestic growth at 6.4 per cent in a sharp decline from 8.2 per cent the previous year. That marks the lowest annual growth rate in four years impacted by the manufacturing and se...

title: $155B Boost in Infrastructure Could Double Africa GDP
description:
Africa could double its GDP by 2040 if annual infrastructure investment by African countries rises to USD 155 billion, according to a new joint report from the OECD and the African Union Commission.

Africa's Development Dynamics 2025: Infrastructure, Growth and Transformation shows that an average ...
